title: Show Stripe settings in user panel and grant admin access

requirements.text: Display Stripe settings section in the user account dashboard (AccountDashboardPage) with a navigation card that links to the payment settings page, similar to the existing Product Management card

quotes: stripe settings are not showing in user pannel

acceptanceCriteria: User account dashboard shows a Stripe Settings or Payment Settings card alongside the Product Management card
Clicking the card navigates to the payment settings page
Card is visible to all authenticated users

requirements.text: Grant admin privileges to the current authenticated user on the live production deployment so they can access admin features including Stripe configuration

quotes: make me admin in live page

acceptanceCriteria: The current user's principal is added to the admin role in the backend
User can access admin pages including AdminStripeSettingsPage after being granted admin access

constraints: Do not modify existing admin assignment logic in AdminSetupPage
Preserve existing payment settings page functionality
Maintain authentication checks for admin-only pages
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire account dashboard layout
Changing the admin role verification system
